content: in the run-up to valentine s day i wanted to share with you a little heart it s a last minute-gift that can also be perfect to use your scraps of yarn it takes about 5 to 10 minutes to make it then you will be able to spread the love with your makes **you will need ** * basics such as scissors stitch marker stuffing sewing needle * choose a yarn and the appropriate hook size **pale yellow heart version ** -------------------------- * maxi sugar rush 50g/280m - 100% mercerized cotton color 101-candle light * 1 50 mm hook **purple heart version** --------------------- * catona denim 50g/125m - 100% cotton color sch-136 purple * 2 50 mm hook **pink heart version ** ------------------- * colour crafter 100g/300m - 100% premium acrylic color 1130 sittard * 3 50 mm hook have fun and enjoy ps don t forget to link a project and add pictures it will be my pleasure to share your makes on my blog slightly_smiling_face magali copyright 2021 @mignoncrochet all rights reserved - original pattern created by mignoncrochet this pattern is only for personal use you are not authorized to distribute reproduce publish online or print translate alter or resell this pattern in whole or in part in any form paper internet … you are authorized to sell the finished products if they are made by you in limited quantities and recalling the name of the designer … from an original pattern of mignon crochet mignoncrochet com»
